p: Recently, Bosch began R&D of a POCT system; the result of their efforts is the Vivalytic System ( Fig. 4D), a molecular diagnostic device based on a microwell array that is capable of detecting the coronavirus in less than 2.5 h, using a fully sealed cartridge. The Vivalytic system performs sample preparation, after which it performs a multiplex PCR, followed by microarray-detection, to allow the identification of SARS-CoV-2 [ 92].
